vocabulary.definition: near the beginning of the day
special clothes for school or work

article_caption: A healthy breakfast with fruit and juice

article_paragraphs.text: Every day, I wake up early in the morning. My alarm clock rings at 6:30 AM. I get out of bed and stretch my arms. The first thing I do is wash my face and brush my teeth. This helps me feel awake.

After that, I put on my school uniform. It is blue and white. Then, I go to the kitchen for breakfast. My mom makes healthy food. I usually eat eggs, toast, and fruit. I drink a glass of orange juice, too.
At 7:30 AM, I am ready to go. I grab my backpack and say goodbye to my mom. I walk to the bus stop with my friends. We talk and laugh before the school bus comes. I like my morning routine.

comprehension_questions.question: What time does the alarm clock ring?
What does the writer do first?
options: c) Washes face and brushes teeth

comprehension_questions.question: What color is the school uniform?
How does the writer get to school?

short_answer_question: What do you do every morning? Write two things you do before school.

vocab_fill.sentence: I wake up to see the sunrise.
I wear a to work.
Are you to go to the park?

sentence_completion_prompts.prompt: For breakfast, I like to eat

writing_prompt: Write about your breakfast. What do you eat? What do you drink? Do you eat with your family?

sentence_order_answers.sentence: We walk to the bus stop.
